Package sbw.architecture.bus

Class BusManager

java.lang.Object
sbw.architecture.bus.BusManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_ClockListener
public class BusManager extends Object implements I_ClockListener
Defines the collection manager that maintains bus components on a bus.

      public void connect(A_Component<?> component) throws BusException
      Connects a unique bus component exclusively to this bus.

      Throws:
      BusException - if the component is already connected to a bus

      Returns:

    • update_

      public void update_()
      Informs the listener that a clock update has occurred. Calls update_() on all components on this bus, if it is enabled.
      Specified by:
      update_ in interface I_ClockListener
